title: Establishing a Task Force for AI-Enhanced Phishing and Ransomware Defense
objective: To create and implement a specialized task force that will develop advanced detection tools and conduct training programs focused on mitigating AI-enhanced phishing and ransomware threats.
timeline_phases: Phase 3: Training Program Design and Development
kpis: User adoption rate of detection tools
risks: Insufficient technical skills within the team
Rapid evolution of phishing and ransomware tactics
Compliance risks related to data privacy
